attributes.action: make it compulsory for all dog owners to have at least 3 months training classes with their new dogs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the current climate of media a lot of hype is put on dangerous dogs and the dangerous dogs act but not enough light is shed on the owners and lack of training for these animals. 
Many dogs are loving and friendly but lack of training can lead the friendliest of dogs to behave badly and even end up themselves, other dogs or humans. 

Compulsory training for all new dog owners would leave the owner with the confidence to control and look after their pet and the the dog with the ability to socially interact with other humans and dogs, decreasing attacks on adults and children within UK homes.
